text.value: Please go back and type the patient ID or scan the QR code on the sample or the storage form
Other (List here other symptoms described by patient or carer)
Welcome to the lab data collection form for the Please make sure that all the appropriate materials and supplies are ready.
NP03: Type of Visit (Tick ONE that applies):
Lab to fill the following questions:
Lived or worked in close contact with goats
Lived or worked in close contact with sick chickens
Waded, swum or bathed in pond water, lake water, or stream water
Lived or worked in close contact with cattle
NP11: Number of NP swabs received:
Thank you for entering the NP swab data. Please finalise and send the form to server.
2 = decerebrate (an abnormal posture that can include rigidity, arms and legs held straight out, toes pointed downward, head and neck arched backwards)

3 = decorticate posture (an abnormal posture that can include rigidity, clenched fists, legs held straight out, and arms bent inward toward the body with the wrists and fingers bend and held on the chest)
Please go back and either scan or type a patient ID
Use the tablet's camera to scan the patient's QR code
2 = Cries appropriately with pain, or, if verbal, speaks
1 = Moan or abnormal cry with pain
Malaria positive, Control line and pf line only shown: falciparum infection
Malaria negative, Control line only shown
Malaria positive, Control line and Pan line shown: P. vivax, Po, Pm, non-falciparum Infection
Malaria positive, Control line and Pan line and pf line shown: falciparum infection or mixed infection
Invalid test result, control line not shown
Invalid test result, control line not shown, but one or more test lines are present
NP07: Enter any comments about the NP Swab:
Please select the country that the lab is located in.

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Type the patient ID number in the format XX12345

select1.hint: if no then manually type the patient ID on the next screen

input.hint: The ID can be read from the sample or the storage form.
